meanings.definition: Resembling a pyramid in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The sandcastle had a pyramidic top made of wet sand.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins featured a pyramidic monument at the center.
meanings.sent3: The chef created a pyramidic stack of colorful fruits for dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a pyramidic shape, towering above her head.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a pyramidic mountain against the sunset sky.
